author: smoortga
body:
This PR is simply a backport to 80X from the following PRs in 81X (already merged)
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/16161
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/16280
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/16367 (Fully-approved, orp-pending)

It applies some fixes to the TrackHistory code needed for Track monitoring in the BTV group.
title: Track history fixes backport80 x
